name: spec-generator-script
description: Generates the element/property tables for our specs based on the schema file.
author: AdaptiveCards

scripts.release: npm run build && webpack --mode=production && npm run dts
scripts.build-all: cd ../spec-generator && npm run build-all && cd ../spec-generator-script && npm run build
scripts.build-all-and-run: npm run build-all && npm run run
